choices.A: The deleted field and its data can be restored up to 30 days after deletion.
choices.D: The deleted field and its data can be restored up to 15 days after deletion.
choices.B: The deleted field can be restored up to 15 days after deletion, but all data will be lost.

discussion.content:
D
Deleted custom fields and their data are stored until your org permanently deletes them or 15 days has elapsed, whichever happens first. Until that time, you can restore the field and its data.
